field.label: Cookie Timeout Usage
field.comment: Separate cookie for each popup allows you to record time when popup was closed for each popup independently. When 2 or more popups are enabled at the same time, the user will see 2nd popup after the page refresh even if the 1st popup was just closed.

Other fields, such as Fax, Gender, Coupon can be created using custom fields functionality. You can load a list of all custom fields below. Or check our online documentation for more info.
